explains: adj. 令人懊悔的，令人遗憾的

sentences.en: The loss of jobs is highly regrettable.
sentences.cn: 失去工作非常令人遗憾。

sentences.en: It is regrettable that the police were not informed sooner.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是没有早些报警。

sentences.en: The manner in which the decision was announced was extremely regrettable.
sentences.cn: 宣布决定的方式非常令人遗憾。
